title: PSA to all laners!
body:
If you suck and you not only lost lane but fed your enemy laner, dont blame the jungler on your shitty playing. Its unprofessional and makes you look very pathetic.

If you are not getting ganks it is because either A. you are pushed so far up that its impossible to gank or B. The jungler notices that you suck and are feeding and wants to get other lanes fed in order to carry your sorry pathetic ass. Most of the time its a combination of A and B.

-------------------------------------------------
Sincerely, 
Your Friendly Neighbor Jungler
